Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Wallop under the authority of the order of Aug  3, 81 favorably without amendment. With written report No. 97-183.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 256.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey, by quitclaim deed, all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to certain lands that were withdrawn or acquired for the purposes of relocating a portion of the city of American Falls out of the area flooded by the American Falls Reservoir.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the city of American Falls, Idaho, specified lands located within or adjacent to the city. Reserves all rights-of-way and oil and gas in such lands to the United States.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey, by quitclaim deed, all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to certain lands that were withdrawn or acquired for the purposes of relocating a portion of the city of American Falls out of the area flooded by the American Falls Reservoir.
